queries.query: select * from dailyjournal where parent='param1' order by modifieddatetime desc limt 1
select * from dailyjournal where parent='param1' order by modifieddatetime desc limt 1

select json_extract(Payload,'$.WDSNumber') as entityname, json_extract(Payload,'$.UUID') as entityid from wds where json_extract(Payload,'$.WeldType')='WPS' or
 json_extract(Payload,'$.WeldType')='param1'
select count (*) + 1 as journalcount from dailyjournal where parentEntityId='param1'
select top 1 sequence + 1 from dailyjounrnal where parent='param1' order by seqeunce desc

select json_extract(payload,'$.lemnumber') as lemnumber,lem.uuid as uuid, lem.uuid as entityid,lem.parententityid,
laborTable.lamborCount as laborcount,
laborTable.totalHours as labortotalhours,
laborequipment.lamborEquipment as equipmentcount, 
lemmaterial.materialCount as materialtickets,  
lemthirdparty.thirdPartyCount as thirdpartytickets  
from lem 
left join (select parent as UI, count(*) as lamborcount ,sum(json_extract(payload,'$.labordtlaborhours') + json_extract(payload,'$.laborstlaborhours') + json_extract(payload,'$.laborotlaborhours')) as totalHours   from lem_labor where parententityid='param1')  laborTable on laborTable.UI=lem.uuid 
left join (select parent as UI,count(*) as lamborEquipment from lem_equipment where parententityid='param1')  laborequipment on laborequipment.UI=lem.uuid 
left join (select parent as UI,count(*) as materialcount from lem_material	 where parententityid='param1')  lemmaterial on lemmaterial.UI=lem.uuid 
left join (select parent as UI,count(*) as thirdpartycount from lem_thirdparty where parententityid='param1')  lemthirdparty on lemthirdparty.UI=lem.uuid 
where lem.parententityid='param1'
